sQuestion: A person wishes to invest 2,400.00 dollars , part at 9 % and part at 6 %. If the total interest desired at the end of the year is 189.00 dollars , how much should be invested at each rate?

sentences.sentence: A person wishes to invest 2,400.00 dollars , part at 9 % and part at 6 %.
If the total interest desired at the end of the year is 189.00 dollars , how much should be invested at each rate?
